label: Goemans, Geert & Lois B. O'Brien.  2005. Villala Goemans and O’Brien, a new genus of Fulgoridae (Hemiptera, Fulgoromorpha) with three new species from Mexico, Belize, Guatemala, Honduras, and Costa Rica. Studies on Neotropical Fauna and Environment 40(2): 149-153.
